Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-31344 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-31344 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package giflib is earlier than 5.2.1-9, affected by CVE-2025-31344
